alfredsnippet.snippet:
# built-in stylers
## max,min,null
df.style.highlight_max(subset=['Count'],color='yellow',axis=0) # subset = None, yellow is default
df.style.highlight_min() # yellow hightlight to all columns min values
df.style.highlight_null(null_color='red')
alfredsnippet.name: pandas stylying builtins
